text: Naomi Mugo (born 2 January 1977, in Nyahururu) is a Kenyan middle-distance runner who specializes in the 1500 metres and cross-country running. She was the 1999 winner of the Cross Internacional de Soria competition. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=4|1996 |rowspan=2|World Cross Country Championships |rowspan=2|Stellenbosch, South Africa |bgcolor="cc9966"| 3rd |Long race | |- |bgcolor="gold"| 1st |Team | |- |rowspan=2|African Championships |rowspan=2|Yaoundé, Cameroon |bgcolor="gold"| 1st |800 m | |- |bgcolor="gold"| 1st |1500 m | |- |rowspan=2|1997 |rowspan=2|World Cross Country Championships |rowspan=2|Turin, Italy |8th |Long race | |- |bgcolor="silver"| 2nd |Team | |- |1998 |World Cross Country Championships |Marrakech, Morocco |11th |Long race | |- |rowspan=2|2001 |rowspan=2|World Cross Country Championships |rowspan=2|Oostende, Belgium |11th |Short race | |- |bgcolor="silver"| 2nd |Team | |- |2002 |Africa Military Games |Nairobi, Kenya |bgcolor=gold|1st |1500 mAfrica Military Games. GBR Athletics. Retrieved on 2015-01-30. |- |rowspan=3|2003 |World Championships |Paris, France |6th |1500 m | |- |All- Africa Games |Abuja, Nigeria |bgcolor="cc9966" | 3rd |1500 m | |- |World Athletics Final |Monte Carlo, Monaco |6th |1500 m | |} ==Personal bests== *1500 metres – 3:58.12 min (1998) *3000 metres – 8:43.55 min (2000) *5000 metres – 15:25.13 min (2000) ==References== * *Pace Sports Management Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nyandarua County Category:Kenyan female middle-distance runners Category:Kenyan female long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Kenya Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Kenya Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1998 Commonwealth Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Kenya Category:African Games bronze medalists for Kenya Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Kenyan female cross country runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2003 All-Africa Games
title: Naomi Mugo
